episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a variety of topics including a humorous exploration of AI-generated content, the unique behavior of snails, an Italian politician's excessive smoking habit, and the historical origins of Covent Garden's name.

facts.fact: There is a type of moss called political moss.
Snails use trails like we use roads.
Italy's defense minister was once hospitalised for smoking 150 cigarettes in a day.
We've all been pronouncing Covent Garden wrong.
